name: extrusion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the process of forming something by forcing or pushing it out, especially through a small opening: Volcanic activity resulted in the extrusion of a lava sheet. the extrusion of plastic objects
[ C ] something formed by being forced or pushed out, especially through a small opening: The fibers are plastic extrusions, similar to optical fibre. See
extrude
More examplesFewer examplesThe lava dome in the 8,364-foot mountain may be weakened and more likely to allow an explosion or extrusion of lava.He began to sweat, a weird cold extrusion of moisture that began to trickle down his face. the extrusion of plastic objectsThe company is an industrial manufacturer of aluminum extrusions. Extrusions are limited to straight lines and arcs, so you can't create spirals this way.
